source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_00<tab>Briardien glances at you, adjusting his spectacles.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_00<tab>聖アンダリム神学院のブリアルディアンは、きちんと調べたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_01<tab>Briardien has a hunch that the missing volume eleven of the <var 1A 02 /var>Articles of Halonic Polity<var 1A 01 /var> and Ulaa's sudden withdrawal are somehow connected, and decides to find the girl to ask her what─or who caused her to change her mind. In the meantime, Saturnois has asked to meet with you in private in the plaza next to Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_01<tab>ブリアルディアンは、退学した神学生と正教法大全11巻について調べるという。一方、サテュールノワは冒険者に話があるという。イシュガルド上層の「サテュールノワ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_02<tab>At the plaza, Saturnois introduces Theomocent and Leigh as the students whom he is counseling to obtain Trinity seats. He also expresses his concerns about Archombadin and Lebrassoir, and their blatant discrimination of lowborn peers. In their pursuit to prove their virtue, Theomocent and Leigh discuss finding like-minded individuals with whom they could ally, and Crammevoix is mentioned as a possible candidate. As Leigh is unenthusiastic in approaching any of the highborn, Saturnois asks you to accompany Theomocent to the Pillars to find Crammevoix.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_02<tab>サテュールノワと話した。彼らは、アルションバダンに対抗するつもりらしい。テオモサンとともに、クラムヴォワを勧誘することになった。イシュガルド上層の「テオモサン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_03<tab>While Theomocent tries his best to persuade Crammevoix to join his cause, it would appear that his timing is unfortunate as the suave seminarian is preoccupied with a beautiful young woman who had been vying for his attention. Laughing at Theomocent's cluelessness in the situation, the highborn student attempts to brush aside his resolve, and leaves elsewhere with the lady. But Theomocent refuses to give up just yet, and urges you to follow him to Foundation.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_03<tab>テオモサンとともにクラムヴォワを勧誘したが、同意を得られなかった。イシュガルド下層の「テオモサン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_04<tab>Unexpectedly, Theomocent discovers Crammevoix tied up by his now knife-wielding lady friend. Despite his peril, he warns the timid seminarian not to interfere with his house's affairs, explaining that the woman is one of the smallfolk of his lands, who has rightfully come to seek recompense for his father's sins; he assumes he will most likely pay with his life, as his father had. Theomocent emotionally objects, and tries to convince the woman to accept coin instead of committing a sin herself. He then offers to exchange his life until Crammevoix can return, a gesture that the highborn is moved by.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_04<tab>クラムヴォワは、領民に囚われ、脅迫されていた。彼を助けるために、テオモサンは身代わりになると申し出た。イシュガルド下層の「クラムヴォワ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_05<tab>Trusting that Crammevoix will pay her his house's fortune, the woman reluctantly exchanges her prisoner, with Theomocent bound in his stead. Crammevoix promises to return soon after retrieving the coffer from its hidden place in Coerthas. With Theomocent assuring you he will be fine, Crammevoix asks you to accompany him to ensure bandits do not ambush him on the way back. Make haste to western Coerthas, before the knife-wielding woman loses her patience.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_05<tab>クラムヴォワによると、隠し財産があるらしい。クルザス西部高地のナインスヴェアー付近にいる「クラムヴォワ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_06<tab>You join Crammevoix in the western highlands, and he asks you to stand watch while he retrieves the family fortune. Ensure nothing will catch him unawares.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_06<tab>クラムヴォワと合流した。彼が隠し財産を掘り出す間、付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9E4B01 /var>」で見張ろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_07<tab>As you wait for Crammevoix to search for the coffer, a group of hungry archaeornis seemingly appears out of nowhere. You dispatch the beasts and continue your watch.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_07<tab>周囲を見回したところ、魔物を発見して討伐した。クラムヴォワは、まだ隠し財産を掘り出しているようだ。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9E5901 /var>」で再度、見張ろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_08<tab>After what felt like an eternity, Crammevoix finally produces his family's fortune. He bids you both return to Ishgard, and hopes that Theomocent is still alive and well.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_08<tab>クラムヴォワが、隠し財産を掘り出した。イシュガルド下層の「妖艶な女性」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_09<tab>Satisfied with the amount of monetary compensation for the war dead, the woman leaves without a word. Leigh and Saturnois arrive moments later, and Crammevoix reveals to all his father's sin; that he sought honor with the Holy See, and bought it with the blood of the smallfolk and eventually his own. After being left adrift in Ishgard since the murders of his family, Crammevoix is inspired by Theomocent's will to leave the sins of the past behind, declaring himself a friend and ally in their cause. Meanwhile, Saturnois tells you that Briardien has been waiting for you at the cathedral with some new information.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_09<tab>妖艶な女性と接触し、テオモサンを救出した。これまでの目標を失ったクラムヴォワは、新たな目標の実現のために、平民の神学生たちとの協力を決意した。聖レマノー大聖堂の「ブリアルディアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_10<tab>You meet with Briardien, who tells you some concerning news about his investigation. Looking to inquire of Ulaa as to why she felt compelled to leave the scholasticate, he discovers that the girl has vanished altogether. Along with the missing volume eleven, Briardien comments that someone may indeed be trying to turn the situation to their advantage, and your duty as inspectors is to seek out the malicious forces at work.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SEQ_10<tab>ブリアルディアンと話した。復学の意思を持っていたはずのウラーが行方不明となっているようだ。一方、彼女が好んだという「正教法大全11巻」もまた、再び紛失したらしい。これらの出来事も、神学院内の貴族と平民の対立を煽る存在の仕業なのだろうか……？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Saturnois in the Pillars.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_00<tab>上層のサテュールノワと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Theomocent.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_01<tab>テオモサンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Theomocent in Foundation.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_02<tab>下層のテオモサンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Crammevoix.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_03<tab>クラムヴォワと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_04<tab>Rendezvous with Crammevoix in the Coerthas western highlands.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_04<tab>クルザス西部高地のクラムヴォワと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_05<tab>Wait for Crammevoix to return.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_05<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9E4B01 /var>で見張る

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_06<tab>Wait for Crammevoix to return.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_06<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9E5901 /var>で再度見張る

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_07<tab>Speak with the lascivious lass in Foundation.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_07<tab>下層の妖艶な女性と話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Briardien in Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_TODO_08<tab>聖レマノー大聖堂のブリアルディアンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_GAETELLE_000_000<tab>It is true that Ulaa had signed the paperwork to formally withdraw from her studies, but knowing her passion for study of scripture, I feel something is amiss...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_GAETELLE_000_000<tab>ウラーが退学を申し出たのは確かなのですが……
クラムヴォワの言葉にも嘘がないように聞こえました。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_000<tab>The five pupils who brought back the truants are no doubt vying for the highest marks. But it would seem the dormitory prefects came out on top this time...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_000<tab>成果を出した神学生は、たったの5人……。
多くは、寮長の呼び掛けに応えて、
活動の成果を寮長たちに差し出したようですね……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, were you present when Crammevoix spoke with Ulaa?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
君は先ほど話に出た、ウラーという女子生徒と話したのか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_GAETELLE_000_001<tab>...So she was indeed enthusiastic about returning to the scholasticate.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_GAETELLE_000_001<tab>英雄様も、ウラーの復学の意思を確認されたか……。
では、なぜ彼女は、まったく逆の行動に出たのでしょう？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_002<tab>Then why did she instead decide to withdraw?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんと別れた直後に、
心変わりしたということでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_003<tab>Crammevoix all but accused Archombadin of having a hand in it, as well as the disappearance of this volume eleven. Naught more than slander spoken in anger, perhaps, but the situation does merit further investigation.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_003<tab>どうやら、薄汚い足の引っ張り合いが行われているらしい。
「正教法大全11巻」とやらが、対立の原因かもしれん。
ぼくは、このあたりを調べてみるとしよう。

source:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_004<tab>We look forward to your results, Inspector.
<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>─if I might have a word with you in private? Pray meet with me near the plaza in front of Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_004<tab>では、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
話したいことがあるので、お時間をいただけないでしょうか？
聖レマノー大聖堂の正面に位置する広場で待っています。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_009<tab>Archombadin and Lebrassoir are truly impressive! That they were able to bring the most students back to the scholasticate, they surely have a way with words! Would that I had such skill...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_009<tab>アルションバダンさんは、やっぱりすごいです……。
僕も、もっと心を込めて奉仕活動にあたらなくては……！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_009<tab>Theo can be so thickheaded sometimes. He doesn't realize that all those students Archombadin and Lebrassoir brought back will make our lives a living hell. At least Father Saturnois understands the stakes.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_009<tab>テオは、ニブいから気にしてないが、
腹黒寮長は、平民組への当たりが強くてな。
サテュールノワ司祭様は、俺たち平民神学生の心強い味方さ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_GAETELLE_000_009<tab>Whatever her reasons, it is our loss. Ulaa was an excellent student.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_GAETELLE_000_009<tab>なんとかして、ウラーの本心を確認したいところですね……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_010<tab>Thank you for coming, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. You are already acquainted with my two best students, Theomocent and Leigh?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、よく来てくれました。
ここに集うのは、いずれも平民出身の神学生であり、
首席を目指す意思と能力に溢れた者でもあります。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_011<tab>They have sought my counsel in their quest to obtain the Trinity seats, and I have been more than willing to oblige them out of a desire to ensure that all students are given equal opportunity. I am not blind to the machinations of our highborn students, after all.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_011<tab>寮長アルションバダンは、「点数争い」を否定しながら、
その裏で、自身の意にそぐわぬ神学生を虐げています。
自分たち貴族で、上位三席を独占するために……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_012<tab>I know not what Archombadin and Lebrassoir have said to you, but I advise you to weigh it carefully. You witnessed their treatment of a fellow highborn student, did you not? Then it should come as no surprise that they regard their lowborn peers far more harshly, discriminating against them with whatever means at their disposal.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_012<tab>クラムヴォワは貴族ではあるものの、
彼らの意思に従わなかったため、陥れられたのでしょう。
これでは、平民学生への公正な評価など期待できません。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_013<tab>Those two believe that less fortunate students lack the potential to become great clergymen. But, if Theomocent and Leigh can obtain the highest marks and secure their places within the Trinity through their hard work and virtue, then these misguided beliefs would be proved wrong.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_013<tab>……そこで私たちは、同じ志を持つ者で結束し、
寮長率いる「貴族組」に対抗しようと画策しているのです。
私たちが、歪んだ秩序を葬り、聖なる秩序を生み出すために。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_014<tab>Even if we were to succeed, what difference would it make? Those who disagree will not be so easily swayed, and those who sympathize will be reluctant to speak out for fear of reprisals.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_014<tab>でも、平民出身の連中は乗ってこないだろうな……。
みんな、苦労の末に神学院に潜り込んできてるから、
貴族組に逆らって、聖職者の道を断たれるのが怖いんだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_015<tab>Then you must find allies who are fearless─who do not flinch in the face of threats. <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, have you come across any who fit that description?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_015<tab>つまり、寮長の妨害にも退かぬ、
揺るぎない気概を持つ神学生が必要というわけです……。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、心当たりはありませんか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_Q1_000_001<tab>仲間にできそうな神学生は？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_A1_000_001<tab>What about Crammevoix?
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_A1_000_001<tab>クラムヴォワ

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_016<tab>I thought so as well! He seems to treat everyone the same. And he defended Ulaa's honor at the assembly.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_016<tab>……僕も、同じことを思っていました！
彼は貴族なのに、僕にも気さくに話しかけてくれて、
笑顔を絶やさない、いい人です！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_017<tab>Um, what about Crammevoix? He seems to treat everyone the same. And he defended Ulaa's honor at the assembly.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_017<tab>……あの、クラムヴォワさんがいいと思います。
彼は貴族なのに、僕にも気さくに話しかけてくれて、
笑顔を絶やさない、いい人です！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_018<tab>The highborn lecher? Who skips out on sessions and can't even stay awake for the ones he attends? Theo, are you daft? If he did decide to help us, I wouldn't even want it!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_018<tab>なっ、なんだと！？
あんなのヘラヘラしているだけの、お祭り男だろうが！
俺は断固反対だ、頼りになんかなりっこない！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_019<tab>No need to dismiss him out of hand, Leigh. As Theomocent said, he spoke out openly against Archombadin and Lebrassoir on behalf of Ulaa. He might be willing to do the same for you two.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_019<tab>……ですが、寮長と対立する意思があるのは確かです。
もしかしたら、協力してくれるかもしれませんね。

source:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_020<tab>Absolutely not. I don't trust any of the highborn!
...Look, I'll help with finding others, but you're on your own with Crammevoix.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_020<tab>貴族なんて信じられねえ……！
俺は、俺なりに骨の有りそうな平民の神学生を探ってみる……。
……お祭り男は、みんなに任せるよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_021<tab>Very well. <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, will you accompany Theomocent? One cannot be too careful, especially with the rise in assaults on the clergy.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、お願いがあります。
私たちの仲間集めに、しばしお付き合い願えませんか？
貴族組の妨害があったときに証人が必要なのです。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_021<tab>Thank you. I am certain we can find him in the Pillars, in his usual spot.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_021<tab>ありがとうございます、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
それでは、さっそくクラムヴォワさんに話をしてみましょう。
おそらく、いつもの場所にいるはずです。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_029<tab>While I appreciate a scholarly debate as much as anyone, your bespectacled friend does not seem to understand that this is neither the time nor the place.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_029<tab>はあ～い、<var 08 E905 ((お嬢さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>、いいところに来てくれたよ！
ソバカス君がうるさくて、弱ってるんだ～。
どこかへ連れて行ってくれるかな？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_029<tab>Ugh, and I was so close. I'm not going to get <var 1A 02 /var>anywhere<var 1A 01 /var> at this rate.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_029<tab>あんたも、彼との甘いひとときを邪魔するつもり！？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_030<tab>I thought he would be more receptive to my appeal, but instead he seems rather annoyed...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_030<tab>ああ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
クラムヴォワさんが、なかなか話を聞いてくれないんです。
貴方からも、協力を依頼してくださいませんか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_031<tab>Can't you and Freckles see we're busy? Leave us be!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_031<tab>んもう、また変なのが増えたわ！
あんたも、このソバカスと仲間ね！？
彼が嫌がってるんだから、あっち行きなさいよ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_032<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Freckles<var 1A 01 /var>! You certainly have a way with words, my dear! She is quite right, you know. We have more pressing matters to attend to.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_032<tab>そーそー、面倒ゴトはゴメンだよ～。
オレはただ、毎日を祝祭にして、笑って過ごしたいだけさ～。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_033<tab>Crammevoix, please, will you not help our cause? I believe us to be like-minded individuals, those who desire a new path for the church, one based on principles of─
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_033<tab>僕を育ててくれた司祭様も、同じことをおっしゃっていました。
だから、貴方は僕たちと同じ考えを持つ同志だと思ったんです！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_034<tab>Ahahaha, so earnest and forthright! How <var 1A 02 /var>adorable<var 1A 01 /var>! I can hardly resist pinching those soft, supple cheeks!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_034<tab>あははは～。
ソバカス君ってば、ホント、いつもながらバカ正直だね。
女の子だったら、抱きしめてたところだよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_035<tab>Oh, for the love of─ Come, darling. Let us go somewhere that will afford us <var 1A 02 /var>privacy<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_035<tab>もー、いい加減にして！
クラムヴォワ、邪魔者がいない場所に行きましょ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_036<tab>Mmm, an offer that I dare not refuse! Good luck with...whatever it is you're about, Freckles!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_036<tab>そういうことだから、オレは行くよ～。
ソバカス君は、しっかり「点数争い」に勤しむんだよ。
君なら、もしかすると、もしかするかもしれないからさ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_037<tab>He's gone... No! I cannot give up! The future of the church depends on us! I was not given an opportunity to explain in full, so I will not leave his side until he hears me out!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_037<tab>あぁ、行っちゃいました……。
クラムヴォワさんは、下層へ向かったようですね……。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、追いかけましょう！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_039<tab>This is, um...this is not what you think.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_039<tab>あはは～、身から出たサビってやつだね……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_039<tab>Aren't we persistent. Well, if you value his life, I suggest you listen to me <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> time and leave us be.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_039<tab>ちっ、しつこいね。
さっさと消えれば、あんたらは見逃してやる。
もちろん、ここで見たことは誰にも言うんじゃないよ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_040<tab>N-Now, let's not get too hasty. I'm sure we can resolve this matter peacefully...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、どうしましょう！？
なぜ、こんなことに……！？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_041<tab>Agreed─so long as you don't try something stupid and give me cause to cut his throat.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_041<tab>近寄ったら、コイツの命はないよ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_042<tab>Did I not tell you I was preoccupied? You there─take Freckles and get out of here.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_042<tab>まさか君たちが、ついてくるとはね……。
<var 08 E905 ((お嬢さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>、今すぐソバカス君を連れて逃げてくれ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_043<tab>Release him at once or I'll summon the watch!
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_043<tab>ぼ、ぼ、ぼ、ぼく、神殿騎士を呼んできます！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_044<tab>Don't you dare. The affairs of House Maintigny are none of your concern! She demands recompense, and rightly so. If I must pay with my life, then so be it.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_044<tab>行かなくていいんだ！
この人は実家の領民でね、オレに償いを求めにきたのさ。
でも、オレに差し出せるのは、命ぐらいしかないからね。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_045<tab>I will not allow it!
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_045<tab>あ、諦めちゃダメです！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_046<tab>Oh, do not look so glum. If I must look upon your freckled face before I ascend to Halone's halls, I would rather you favored me with a smile or some such.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_046<tab>おいおい、そんな顔しなさんな。
オレ、目の前の人には笑っててほしいんだよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_047<tab>...Father's sins are mine alone to bear now─mine alone to answer for. Mayhap in death our house shall at last be redeemed.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_047<tab>でも、いちばん笑わせたかった父上は、逝ってしまった……。
父上に捨てられたオレが、その跡取りとして、
責任を肩代わりできるなら、身に余る光栄さ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_048<tab>If it is recompense you desire, then you shall have it. But not with his life!
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_048<tab>……貴方は、お金が欲しいんですね！？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_100_048<tab>The Fury forgives not those who kill their fellow man for wanton purpose. Permit him to address your grievances with coin, and you may have your justice without sin! Furthermore, I offer myself to you as a hostage in his place, that he might be free to secure sufficient ransom!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_100_048<tab>クラムヴォワさん、お金を工面してください！
その間、僕が代わりに捕まってますから！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_049<tab>Have you gone mad!? I told you, this is none of your─
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_049<tab>な……なんで、そうなる！？
これは我が家の問題だ。
ソバカス君は、関係ないだろ！？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_050<tab>I will not abandon such a pious soul─one who shares my desire to make the world a better place!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_050<tab>関係なくないです！！
同じ志を持った大切な仲間です！！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_051<tab>We are not so different, Crammevoix. We have the chance to make amends for the sins of our fathers─to make Ishgard whole again. I cannot do it without you!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_051<tab>僕は、貴方がこの先に出会うすべての人を、
お父上を笑わせるつもりで、笑わせてほしいんです！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_052<tab>...Heh, you really are something else. Making a bloody speech about changing the world at a time like this.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_052<tab>あはは……ソバカス君がバカ正直なの忘れてた。
でも……だから応えたくなる……！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_053<tab>I offer the wealth of House Maintigny as ransom. If the lady agrees to these terms, then I will go and retrieve it at once.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_053<tab>……ふたりとも、力を貸してほしい！
領民を納得させる方法が、ひとつだけあるんだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_054<tab>I'll take her silence as a yes. Now then, come─I've always wanted to tie someone up.
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_054<tab>さて、目の前の人を笑顔にする祝祭を始めるよ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_059<tab>You need not worry about me. I promise I will not move an ilm!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_059<tab>僕のことなら、心配はいりません。
クラムヴォワさんを手伝えて、嬉しいです……！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_059<tab>I can't believe I agreed to this. You had better hope that no one walks this way, or else your friend will pay the price. Understand?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_059<tab>うわっ、なんだこのガキ。
命が危ないってのに、にやついてやがる……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_060<tab>We will have to travel to my family's old estates in the western highlands to retrieve your ransom. I presume you will wait here until I return?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_060<tab>実は、クルザス西部高地に、一族の隠し財産が埋められてる。
かなりの金額になるはずだから、
そいつで納得してもらえるだろうか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_061<tab>For now. But if you do not come back quickly─and with a great deal of money besides─this one's life is forfeit. Is that clear?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_061<tab>そうこなくっちゃ……。
いいだろう、だが帰ってこなけりゃ、このガキの命はないよ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_062<tab>Quite. As for you, Freckles─do not do anything else reckless!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_062<tab>条件に応じてくれて、感謝する。
ソバカス君……すぐに戻るから、少しだけガマンしててくれ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_063<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I must ask that you come with me. It would not do to go through all this trouble only to be waylaid by bandits on my way back. Let us make haste!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_063<tab><var 08 E905 ((お嬢さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>には、護衛を頼みたい。
隠し財産を掘り出す間、周囲を見張っててほしいんだ。
それじゃ……先に行って待ってるよ！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_070<tab>Forgive me─my family's fortune is buried not far from here, but I...I would rather retrieve it alone. Pray remain here a moment and keep watch for bandits and wild beasts.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_070<tab><var 08 E905 ((お嬢さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>、協力してくれて、ありがとう。
財産の隠し場所は、すぐそこなんだ。
今から掘り出すから、ここで見張りをお願いするよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_069<tab>Didn't I ask you to let me do this myself? Please, leave me be!
target: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_069<tab>オレの記憶では、確かこのあたりのハズ……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_075<tab>I have what we came for. Now then, let us pray that Freckles is still alive and well...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_075<tab><var 08 E905 ((お嬢さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>、手間をかけたね。
おかげで目的のモノは掘り出せたから、ソバカス君のもとに急ごう！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_080<tab>It's about time. I'm <var 1A 02 /var>freezing<var 1A 01 /var>, and had half a mind to skin this one to keep warm. Now then. Hand it over.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_RYOUMIN2154_000_080<tab>ほう……逃げ出さなかったとは感心だね。
さっそく、領主が隠してたっていう金を出してもらおうか！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_081<tab>Here you are. The entire fortune that was bequeathed unto me. Share it with your people as recompense, starting with the families of the bereaved. On behalf of House Maintigny, I am truly sorry.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_081<tab>それが、一族に遺された隠し財産のすべてだ。
父上が課した兵役で戦死した者の家族には、多めに配ってくれ。
一族の行いを、どうか許してもらいたい……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_082<tab>Theo! Fury forfend, what have you gotten yourself into this time? I swear, I leave you alone for but a moment─
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_082<tab>テオ、無事だったか！？
お前の話を小耳にはさんで、飛んできたんだ。
まったく無茶しやがって！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_083<tab>I was never in any danger, Leigh. I prayed to the Fury, and by Her hand was Crammevoix returned to me.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_083<tab>クラムヴォワさんが、すぐ戻ってくださったので、
このとおり元気です！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_084<tab>I am terribly sorry to have involved you in my personal affairs. I should have known that the lives of my family would not be enough to sate the smallfolk's thirst for vengeance.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_084<tab>ゴメン、迷惑かけたね……。
家族を殺した領民は怨めしいけど、
父上の罪を償えたことはオレの誇りになったよ、ありがと。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_085<tab>Think nothing of it. I too lost my father, so if you ever have need to speak about it, you can confide in me as a friend.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_THEOMOCENT_000_085<tab>ぼ、僕は何も……。
亡くなったお父上のことを慕ってるんですね……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_086<tab>My father sought to curry favor with the Holy See, and so he raised great levies to send to the front lines. Honor was his prize, but it was bought with the blood of his subjects. And eventually, his own.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_086<tab>父上は功績を立てるために、多くの領民を徴兵して、
ドラゴン族との戦いに明け暮れててね。
でも、その分の犠牲を出して、反感を買ってしまった。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_087<tab>The smallfolk had come to resent his demands for service, and when the truth of the war was revealed, they revolted. The mob overran the manor guard, and my father and five brothers...perished at their hands. Had I not been sent away, I would have surely died with them.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_087<tab>そこにきて、「真実」を知って怒った領民が蜂起して……
父上と5人の兄上は、皆殺しにされてしまったんだ。
オレが助かったのは、神学院に放り込まれていたせいさ。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_088<tab>Our fortunes had grown poor following the Calamity, you see, and since I was the youngest, Father bid me leave to make my own way. So I enrolled in the scholasticate with hopes of becoming a bishop, to bring honor to myself and my house. But now...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_088<tab>領地の財政が厳しくて、父上から厄介払いされた身だったから、
父上を喜ばせたい一心で、ここまでやってきたけど……
その夢は、もう永遠にかなえられなくなってしまった。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_089<tab>No, there's no use dwelling on what could have been. We must look to the future, and do what we can to make Ishgard whole again. Every moment is sacred, and you helped me to see that, Theo. Consider me your friend and ally!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_089<tab>だから、ソバカス君……いや、テオ君。
オレも「点数稼ぎ」に協力させてほしい！
毎日を祝祭にして、すべての人を笑顔にするために。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_090<tab>Well said, Crammevoix, well said. Together, you may yet bring about lasting change.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_090<tab>クラムヴォワ……よく言ってくれました。
悲劇を繰り返さぬために、協力して正教を改革しましょう！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_091<tab>Let's not get ahead of ourselves. Without the endorsement of the scholasticate and the support of our peers, no one will listen to us. What's more, I still haven't heard anyone explain how we're supposed to get seats on the Trinity!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_091<tab>腹黒寮長に立ち向かうには、もっと仲間がいるよな……？
でも、高位聖職者になれるのは上位三席だけだ。
それでも協力してくれる、お人よしなんているだろうか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_092<tab>Ishgard wasn't built in a day, Leigh. Besides, we still have plenty of time to work something out.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_CRAMMEVOIX_000_092<tab>レイ君……時間は、まだあるよ～。
卒業とか、そういう先のことは、その時になったら考えよう～！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_093<tab>See!? I knew he wouldn't take this seriously!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_LEIGH_000_093<tab>司祭！
やっぱり、こいつ、ただのノー天気野郎だ！！

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_094<tab>Calm yourself, Leigh, and keep an open mind. Now, let us return and discuss our next course of action.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_094<tab>こらこら、仲よくなさい。
クラムヴォワの言うとおり、当面は仲間集めに集中します。
では、そろそろ神学院に戻りましょう。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_095<tab>Oh, I nearly forgot. Inspector Briardien was looking for you at the cathedral. He wished to speak with you regarding his investigation, I believe.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SATURNOIS_000_095<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ご協力感謝します。
ブリアルディアンさんにも、状況をお伝えください。
おそらく大聖堂にいるはずですから。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_099<tab>Well then, my associate. Have you anything to report?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_099<tab>戻ったか、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
君の方は何か進展があったか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_100<tab>A former subject of House Maintigny demanding recompense for the misdeeds of Crammevoix's father? How fortunate that the situation was resolved peacefully.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_100<tab>やれやれ、またもや物騒な事件が起こっていただと？
しかし、君がいてくれて助かった。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_101<tab>My investigation has been less productive, unfortunately. I thought to speak with Ulaa, the student who withdrew from the scholasticate, but I cannot find her anywhere.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_101<tab>こちらの捜査状況は芳しくなくてな……。
クラムヴォワが復学させたという、ウラーの行方がわからない。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_102<tab>The same must be said of the infamous volume eleven, which contains passages extolling the virtues of equality. Like the girl, it has vanished without a trace.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_102<tab>さらに、彼女が好んだという「正教法大全11巻」も、
神学院の書棚から消えていた……。
「平等」を説く書物……この紛失が、意味するものは……。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_103<tab>The circumstances surrounding these incidents suggest deliberate intent. Someone may be attempting to turn this tenuous state of affairs to their advantage, but if so, then to what end?
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_103<tab>不審な点ばかりだが、まだひとつの線でつながらない……
やはり学内対立を煽る、何者かが介在しているのか？

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_104<tab>For one thousand years, a sickness has ravaged our city. It has festered within the hearts and minds of our citizens, and in our clergy especially. Treating it will be a long and arduous process─but an altogether necessary one.
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_104<tab>教皇が去り、皇都の病巣が明らかになった。
しかし千年にわたる病は、すでに全身を蝕み、
今や神学院は、歴史の膿に呑み込まれんとしている。

source: TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_105<tab>Our role in that process is clear: to diagnose the root of the scholasticate's ailments. If there are malicious forces at work, then it is our duty to see justice done!
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_BRIARDIEN_000_105<tab>腐った肉を切除し、傷口を縫合し、神学院をあるべき姿に戻す。
それが、事件屋としてのぼくらの使命だ……！

source:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SYSTEM_000_106<tab>In a time of unrest, when the light of truth was lost to the righteous, 
the children looked to one another for guidance, that they might walk in Her grace...
target:
TEXT_CHREND104_02155_SYSTEM_000_106<tab>正教の威光は霧中に消え 立ち塞がる者の姿は未だ見えず
その時 神学生たちが見出す ハルオーネの神意とは――
